normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The entertainment world is buzzing, folks! Film festival season is officially upon us. From Cannes to Kerala, filmmakers and cinephiles are gearing up for a whirlwind of screenings, red carpets, and late night discussions fueled by copious amounts of chai and pakoras. The prestigious Mumbai Film Festival is rumoured to be showcasing some groundbreaking independent films this year, with whispers of a Malayalam flick stealing the show. And let's not forget the buzz around the Chennai International Film Festival, which always brings the South Indian film industry's A-listers out in droves. Speaking of South India, preparations are in full swing for a special Onam celebration during the upcoming Thiruvananthapuram Film Festival. Expect vibrant decorations, kathakali performances, and, of course, plenty of delicious Onam Sadhya to keep everyone energized! So grab your popcorn (or maybe some spicy mixture!), because the next few months are going to be a cinematic feast!
